isis.stitle: HOOD, GRILLE AND FENDERS - 2000, 4000, 8000 - REMOVE AND INSTALL - 4000 SERIES HOOD SEALS

svcsubproc.title: 4700 Thru 4900 Model Hood Seal - Remove
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 59 for items in parentheses.

figure.caption: Figure 59. 4000 Series Hood Seal and 8100 Model Hood Seal

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. 3/16 INCH BLIND RIVET AND NO. 10 FLAT WASHER
4. 3/16 INCH BLIND RIVET AND NO. 10 FLAT WASHER

step1.para: Release the hood latches on each side of the hood and raise the hood to the full open position.

Drill out blind rivets and flat washers (Item 1) using a 9/64 inch (3.56 mm) drill bit and remove upper hood support (Item 2) from cowl flange (Item 3), passenger side shown. Save upper hood support for installation, if not damaged.

Drill out blind rivets and flat washers (Item 4) using a 9/64 inch (3.56 mm) drill bit and remove side hood support (Item 5) from cowl flange (Item 3), passenger side shown. Save side hood support for installation, if not damaged.
Repeat procedure to remove driver side upper and side hood supports.
Remove hood seal (Item 6) from cowl flange (Item 3) by pulling it from the cowl flange lip. Save hood seal for installation, if not damaged.

svcsubproc.title: 4700 Thru 4900 Model Hood Seal - Install
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 59 for items in parentheses.

step1.para: Check the upper and side hood supports and hood seal (Items 2, 5 and 6) for cracks, tears or breaks, if damaged replace them.
Position the hood seal (Item 6) at the cowl flange (Item 3) and push it into place on the cowl flange lip.
Position upper hood support (Item 2) on top of the cowl flange (Item 3) and secure with 3/16 inch blind rivets with No. 10 flat washers (Item 1), passenger side shown.
Position side hood support (Item 5) on the side of the cowl flange (Item 3) and secure with 3/16 inch blind rivets with No. 10 flat washers (Item 4), passenger side shown.
Repeat procedure to install driver side upper and side hood supports.
Close the hood and fasten the hood latches.
